detail_desc: Yoga top in fast-drying jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Cut out section and a mesh panel at the back.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and ventilating mesh panels in the sides.
Fine-knit sports socks with a short ribbed shaft. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.

Running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband. Layered over a pair of short running tights. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with sections in a double layer of woven fabric on the hood and sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with a drawstring, and a taped zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with a mesh section and elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with long raglan sleeves, a rubber print on the sleeves and back, overlocked seams for optimum comfort and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Double-layered top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves with contrasting colour trims.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with thermal fleece inside. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets, ribbed panels at the sides and long raglan sleeves.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and wide, taped reinforcements for extra support. Concealed elastication at the hem. Extra firm support.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour mesh panels down the sides of the legs. Reflective details.
Cropped, boxy-style sports top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Marled sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Seamless.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined sports swimsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a visible zip and long tab at the back for easy zipping and unzipping, and high-cut legs.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Integral bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an inset, V-shaped mesh section at the front, padded cups with removable inserts and narrow elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the sports top is recycled.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with a mesh detail and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Large side pockets with a concealed zip in the side seams. Regular Fit.
Sports set with a short-sleeved top and shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.

Backpack in nylon with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded mesh back plate. Lined. Size 13x28x57 cm (when open).
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Short-sleeved sports top in patterned, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with ventilating mesh side panels. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring. Reflective details.
Long-sleeved base layer top in, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric.

Fitted, padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar with integral hood. Zip down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections down the sides. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, welt back pockets and extra-long legs with sewn-in creases and wide hems. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid. Black is always in style! This liquid will retain the colour of your clothes while treating stains and cleaning them even at low temperatures. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml.
